name: Sonic Jam
description: Four classic SONIC games come to the Saturn on one disk. Experience again the adventures of the original SONIC THE HEDGEHOG. You also get SONIC 2 and SONIC 3. When you want something different, use SONIC & KNUCKLES to transform the other three games into brand new adventures. Also included is a collection of game highlights, commercials, cartoons, enemy profiles, and CD music tracks. With SONIC JAM, you'll be able to relive the speed demon's greatest adventures.
